name.baseName: Low temperature methanol washing unit ; Synthetic gas ; Raw material coal ; Low temperature methanol washing ; All sizes; NESPS2
低温甲醇洗单元 ; 合成气 ; 原料煤 ; 低温甲醇洗 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the treatment technology for the pollution of Crude coaldidn't offered

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the treatment technology for the pollution of Crude coaldidn't offered
technology.technologicalApplicability: 低温甲醇洗单元用于煤炭转化为合成气的过程中，这项技术被工业界用来清洁从煤炭得到的合成气，并可适用于不同规模的设施。这些单元对于生产更纯净的气体流，随后用于各种化学合成或能源生产至关重要。然而，该数据集缺乏对处理尾气污染的技术，表明了未处理排放可能对环境造成的影响。数据集提及了对挥发性有机化合物（VOCs）进行直排的尾端管理技术，但效率为零，暗示污染物直接无减少地排放到大气中。另一提及的技术是再生热燃烧法，其尾端管理VOCs的效率为70%，为尾端管理提供了更可持续的选项。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码25,四级代码2522文件，在完整版文件中第2905页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisRegenerative thermal combustion method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /

污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是蓄热式热力燃烧法，其效率为70，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废气焚烧炉耗电量（千瓦时）/（废气焚烧炉额定功率（千瓦）×废气焚烧炉运行时间（小时））。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为挥发性有机物，产污系数备注为气化工艺为粉煤气化和水煤浆气化的产污系数

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisRegenerative thermal combustion method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
